name: firedancer
description:
An animator using AI tools has a serious problem, there tends to be an issue with the animation flickering in a rapid and unpleasant way. You have two options, technically speaking, you can spend hours processing the footage to interpolate frames and clean up the flickering, or you can lean into the noise.
This was created with the Disco Diffusion notebook and edited and processed in Premiere Pro 2022.
